location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.254 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of a bill sent by Jones for the value of 1,525 Mahomed Shah Keronees [Muhammad Shah Qirans], for the gold watch and diamond ring presented the Persian Slave Trade Commissioner Meerza Mahmood Khan.
